ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Gearheart
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm...it seems odd that your level 33 friend was killing and getting exp from it. It cons blue/green to me at _22_ and I can kill it with 2-3 shots of a
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm...it seems odd that your level 33 friend was killing and getting exp from
it. It cons blue/green to me at _22_ and I can kill it with 2-3 shots of a
magician spell. My 2cp.
Corey

In a message dated 03/05/2000 3:14:45 PM Eastern Standard Time,
jbuckingham@... writes:

<< Just in case anyone was interested, I did the Gearheart quest 10 times on
the weekend, to see if there was a hidden reward in the style of
bullsmasher or the fabulous compactor - my friend was killing him for the
exp, he was blue to a 32-33 and I was running backwards and fowards turning
in his blackbox.. The rewards I got were small leather boots, small leather
writstbands, small round shield, bronze warhammer, bronze short sword...
That hammer had me exited for a bit when I saw it appear, thinking it
perhaps was an upgraded bullsmasher :) But so far the reward looks a little
light for a level 30 quest... Though at level 20 the 10 attempts got me
about 1.5 bubbles of exp :) My factilon at the time was Kindly, but after I
got bored I went and killed rogue clockworks for scrap to try and get the
compactor, which got my faction up to warmly, so I might try it a few more
times next weekend..

Voriig Kye
Erollisi Marr.
>>
